%if form.errors is not None: %if form.error_summary == 'list':

    %for key, error in form.errors.items():
  • ${form[key].title|n}: ${form[key].error()|n}
    • %endfor

%elif form.error_summary == 'string':

%if form.error_summary_message: ${error_summary_message|n} %else: The form contained errors, please edit and resubmit. %endif

%endif %endif
